channel.title: Npc agression

item.title: Npc agression
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

Yes, I have another problem with npc agression. The code gives no errors, but when I walk near the npc I doesn’t attack me!
Here’s the code: //Full NPC Agression- for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person != null) { if(p != null && person != null) { if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == 1241 || npcs[i].npcType == 15) { npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; } else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel) { npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; } } } }
Can someone tell me what’s wrong with it or tell me what to add/change?

Read full topic
